General.Name: Fy Grp Ltd
General.Description: FY Group Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of indoor furniture in Taiwan, Europe, the United States, and Japan. Its products portfolio includes sofas, beds, chairs, and solid wood furniture. The company was founded in 2019 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.1, Fuxing North Road, Taipei, Taiwan
